title: No sign of life
content: We have no internet connection at the _SOTA/Typophile House of Debauchery and Mayhem,_ plus it is extremely dodgy here in Brighton -- I can't send e-mails and I can't even connect to the [Unzipped](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019083131/http:/www.fontshop.be/) CMS, so that's why there are no new posts for now. Normal service will resume on Monday when I'm back.
author: Bald Condensed

comments.content: I found an old blog string re the font Basilea. I commented there and know of the font but still can'tfind aMac Postscript version anywhere. I can make one in Fontographer but am concerned about licensing issues, etc. Did you ever locate a digital version of Basilea? Thanks for any help. RK
